name: Ping Pong (itch) (Juako)
description:
[Controls for PC players]
When entering the game.
Select game mode: W and S key.
Play: Enter Key.
Exit game mode: Click on the black triangle.

Movement Player 1.
Down: D key.
Up: A key.

Movement Player 2.Down: Right arrow.
Up: Left arrow.

[Controls for mobile players]
When entering the game.
Select game mode and play: Press the game mode you want to play on screen.
Exit game mode: Press the black triangle on the screen.

Movement Player 1. (Left side of the screen)
Down: Press the right side of the screen.
Up: Press the left side of the screen.

Movement Player 2. (Right side of the screen)
Down: Press the right side of the screen.
Up: Press the left side of the screen

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
New Version 1.1.0.0
* Bug Fix.
* Ball Speed Improvement.
